Name: Clan Jade Falcon
Description: Gutted in the fight for Terra and the proceeding ilKhan Trial, with 98% percent of their forces on Terra perishing in the struggles, Clan Jade Falcon's survivors numbered roughly 120, with many of those severely injured. Clan Jade Falcon then began serving as a bodyguard Clan vowing to protect the ilKhan and the reborn Star League under new leadership after abandoning the Mongol Doctrine and choosing a new Khan.  The most intact part of the Falcon's touman was their Warfleet, which helped Clan Wolf units to keep watch over the other Clans invited to the IlClan's founding ceremony.  The remaining forces in the Occupation Zone were either conquered by Inner Sphere factions or splintered into newer incarnations of the Clan. One maintains the Clan Jade Falcon identity and is led by Khan Jiyi Chistu, the other, composed by the bulk of the Falcon's Merchant Caste, is the Alyina Mercantile League, led by Merchant caste Syndic Marena.
ReputationStatements: Barbarian, if I had so much as a sibko unit nearby, I would have them perform this task instead of you.  However, if you value your c-bills so highly, take this batchall quickly before I change my mind.

Barbarian, your presence offends me as you have fought against Clan Jade Falcon on many occasions.  If I had a solahama unit available, I would call upon them for this task, but as they are busy, take this batchall if you wish.
Barbarian, the Falcon has faced you in battle before, and you are a competent, if dishonorable warrior.  Take up this batchall and perhaps we can find a more common purpose.
Barbarian, you are an unknown to us.  Prove yourself on the field of battle with this batchall, and we may have further use of you.
You have assisted Clan Jade Falcon in the past.  Continue to be useful by taking up this batchall and we might continue this relationship.
I must admit I am surprised you have been so useful to Clan Jade Falcon.  We offer you this batchall in recognition of your service.
Greetings, my friend.  You have helped me so often, I am beginning to think that perhaps not all mercenaries are scum.  I have this choice task for you that should benefit us both greatly.
MissionSuccessStatements: You have succeeded Commander.  The completion of this batchall pleases me, and I have transferred your c-bills as agreed.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: I should never have entrusted such a trivial task to one so incompetent!  However I will provide a partial payment for your partial completion, so long as you do better next time.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Your cowardice is as much as I expect from mercenary scum.  We have nothing further to discuss, unless you wish to make yourself my bondsman as payment for your failing!
